New Roster (Age of Sigmar) [740pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** (Chaos - Tzeentch) [740pts]

    Rules: At the Double, Forward to Victory, Inspiring Presence

    • Leader [300pts]

      • Magister on Disc of Tzeentch [140pts]

        Selections: 0. Shrouded in Unnatural Flame, 0.Chainfire Amulet, 1. Bolt of Tzeentch, Arcane Bolt, General, Mystic Shield, Teeth and Horns, Tzeenchian Runestaff, Warpsteel Sword

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, TZEENTCH, HERO, WIZARD, MAGISTER, Leader, ARCANITE, General, Artefact

        Artefact: Chainfire Amulet, Command Trait: Shrouded in Unnatural Flame, Magic: Magister on Disc of Tzeentch, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Bolt of Change, Bolt of Tzeentch, Mystic Shield, Unit: Magister on Disc of Tzeentch, Unit Abilities: Fly, Magic-touched, Weapon: Teeth and Horns, Tzeenchian Runestaff, Warpsteel Sword


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Chainfire Amulet If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a missile weapon by the bearer is 6, that attack inflicts D3 mortal wounds on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Shrouded in Unnatural Flame Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with missile weapons that target this general.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Magister on Disc of Tzeentch 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Bolt of Change
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Bolt of Change 7If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster and visible to them. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. If any models were slain by this spell, before removing the first slain model, you can add 1 TZEENTCH CHAOS SPAWN to your army and set it up within 3" of the slain model’s unit.
        Bolt of Tzeentch 7If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster and visible to them. That unit suffers D6 mortal wounds. This spell cannot be cast more than once per turn, even though it appears in both the Lore of Fate and the Lore of Change.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Magister on Disc of Tzeentch 16"675+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Magic-touched If the casting roll for this model is a double and the casting attempt is successful and not unbound, this model can attempt to cast 1 extra spell this turn. If it does so and the extra casting roll is a double, the spell automatically fails and this model is slain.

        If a friendly Magister is slain by this effect, roll a dice before removing the model. On a 2+, 1 Tzeentch Chaos Spawn is added to your army. Set up the Tzeentch Chaos Spawn anywhere on the battlefield within 1" of the slain Magister and more than 3" from any enemy units.

        Choking Tendrils 7If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster and visible to them. That unit suffers D6 mortal wounds. For each model that is slain by mortal wounds inflicted by this spell, you can heal 1 wound allocated to this model.
        Infusion Arcanum 5If successfully cast, add 1 to hit and wound rolls for attacks made by the caster until your next hero phase.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.

        Brutal Rage You can re-roll hit and wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by this model if any wounds or mortal wounds were allocated to this model earlier in the same phase.
        Mighty Rampage After this model makes a charge move, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of this model and roll a dice. On a 2+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

      • Kairic Acolytes [200pts]

        Selections: 2x 10 Kairic Acolytes [200pts], Cursed Blade and Arcanite Shield, Sorcerous Bolt

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, TZEENTCH, KAIRIC ACOLYTES, Battleline

        Magic: Kairic Acolytes, Spell: Gestalt Sorcery, Unit: Kairic Acolytes, Unit Abilities: Arcanite Shield, Kairic Acolytes, Kairic Adept, Weapon: Cursed Blade, Sorcerous Bolt


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Kairic Acolytes 1/1Gestalt Sorcery. It cannot attempt to cast any spells other than Gestalt Sorcery, but any number of KAIRIC ACOLYTES units can attempt to cast Gestalt Sorcery in the same hero phase.
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Gestalt Sorcery 6If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly KAIRIC ACOLYTES unit wholly within 9" of the caster. Until your next hero phase, improve the Rend characteristic of that unit's Sorcerous Bolt attack by 1. A unit cannot benefit from this spell more than once per turn.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Kairic Acolytes 6"155+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Arcanite Shield Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to a unit that has any models armed with Arcanite Shields. On a 6, that wound or mortal wound is negated. When you allocate wounds or mortal wounds to this unit, you must allocate them to a model armed with an Arcanite Shield if it is possible to do so.
        Kairic Acolytes This unit is a Wizard while it has 9 or more models.
        Kairic Adept 1 model in this unit can be a Kairic Adept. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons.

      • Flamers of Tzeentch [140pts]

        Selections: 3 Flamers [140pts], Flaming Maw, Warpflame

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, TZEENTCH, FLAMER, Other

        Unit: Flamers of Tzeentch, Unit Abilities: Capricious Warpflame, Fly, Guided by Billowing Flames, Pyrocaster, Touched by Fire, Weapon: Flaming Maw, Warpflame


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Flamers of Tzeentch 9"2105+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Capricious Warpflame Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this unit if the target unit has 10 or more models. Add 2 to hit rolls instead of 1 if the target unit has 20 or more models.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Guided by Billowing Flames Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with this unit’s Warpflame while it is wholly within 9" of any friendly EXALTED FLAMERS.
        Pyrocaster 1 model in this unit can be a Pyrocaster. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s missile weapon.
        Touched by Fire Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this unit that was inflicted by a melee weapon. On a 5+, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Tzeentch

          Selections: The Pyrofane Cult

          Categories: TZEENTCH

          Battle Trait: Arrows of Tzeentch, Locus of Change, Masters of Destiny, Summon Daemons of Tzeentch, Command Abilities: Immolate, Fate Point Summoning Table - Unit: 01. 1 Lord of Change, 02. 1 Fateskimmer, 03. 10 Pink Horrors of Tzeentch, 04. 1 Burning Chariot of Tzeentch, 05. 3 Flamers of Tzeentch, 06. 1 Changecaster, 07. 1 Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch, 08. 1 Fluxmaster, 09. 10 Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, 10. 10 Brimstone Horrors of Tzeentch, 11. 3 Screamers of Tzeentch


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Arrows of Tzeentch Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with Sorcerous Bolts by friendly PYROFANE CULT KAIRIC ACOLYTE units. In addition, at the end of your shooting phase, roll a dice for each enemy unit that suffered any wounds inflicted by attacks made with Sorcerous Bolts by friendly PYROFANE CULT units in that phase. On a 5+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Locus of Change Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made with melee weapons that target friendly TZEENTCH DAEMON units that are wholly within 12" of a friendly TZEENTCH DAEMON HERO.
        Masters of Destiny Each Destiny Dice spent only allows you to replace a single dice roll. If you want to replace a 2D6 roll (such as a casting roll or charge roll), you must spend 2 Destiny Dice. In addition, any rolls that have been replaced count as unmodified rolls and cannot be rerolled. They also cannot be modified, with the following two exceptions:

        - If you spend a Destiny Dice to replace a save roll, the result of that Destiny Dice is modified by the Rend characteristic of the attack as normal.

        - If you spend a Destiny Dice to replace a battleshock test, the result of that Destiny Dice is modified by the number of models slain from that unit as normal.
        Summon Daemons of Tzeentch You can summon units of TZEENTCH DAEMONS to the battlefield if you collect enough Fate Points. Each time a casting roll (made by friend or foe) is successful and the spell is not unbound, you receive 1 Fate Point.

        Once per turn, at the end of your movement phase, you can spend Fate Points to summon 1 unit from the list opposite to the battlefield and add it to your army.

        Each unit you summon costs a number of Fate Points as shown on the list, and you can only summon a unit if you have enough Fate Points to do so.

        Summoned units must be set up wholly within 12" of a friendly TZEENTCH HERO and more than 9" from any enemy units. Immediately after you have set up the summoned unit, subtract its cost from the total number of Fate Points you have.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Immolate You can use this command ability in your shooting phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly PYROFANE CULT KAIRIC ACOLYTE unit wholly within 12" of a friendly PYROFANE CULT HERO. You can re-roll wound rolls for attacks made by that unit until the end of that phase.
        Fate Point Summoning Table - Unit Cost Ref
        01. 1 Lord of Change 30
        02. 1 Fateskimmer 24
        03. 10 Pink Horrors of Tzeentch 20
        04. 1 Burning Chariot of Tzeentch 18
        05. 3 Flamers of Tzeentch 18
        06. 1 Changecaster 12
        07. 1 Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch 12
        08. 1 Fluxmaster 12
        09. 10 Blue Horrors of Tzeentch 10
        10. 10 Brimstone Horrors of Tzeentch 10
        11. 3 Screamers of Tzeentch 10

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: No Points or Battlerole Validation (Open)

        Categories: Game Options

Force Rules

At the Double: You can use this command ability after you make a run roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, the run roll is treated as being a 6. (Core Rules p3)

Forward to Victory: You can use this command ability after you make a charge roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, re-roll the charge roll. (Core Rules p3)

Inspiring Presence: You can use this command ability at the start of the battleshock phase. If you do so, pick a friendly unit that is within 6" of friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. That unit does not have to take battleshock tests in that phase. (Core Rules p3)
